body.name: Wireless Mini 2.4G WiFi Cameras, Smart 1080P Nanny Cam for Home Security, Built in Battery,Night Vision, Indoor/Outdoor Small Dog Pet Camera for Mobile Phone Applications in Real Time
features: 【Unique Design】With its compact size design, this perfect surveillance camera allows you to easily and discreetly capture any footage in your home, office or car
【Wireless Wifi Camera】 Perfect Surveillanc-e Equipmen-t for protecting your home. With a quick free-app download, you'll be able to enjoy instant feed from the camera anywhere

【Night vision】 This device to capture images in total darkness. Most suspicious activities occur during the night, this mini video camera can be scheduled accordingly. When the light source changes, the auto-light feature will automatically adjust and give you footage of suspicious objects in total darkness

【Works as a Normal Camera without WiFi】 One camera can support multiple users and one app can support multiple cameras simultaneously. This camera features hotspots so it can record without Wi-Fi too: just insert a SD card (not included) and turn on, the mini WiFi camera will auto record HD video files to sd card; It can also record videos even if the network is offline

【EASY WiFi CONNECTION】This mini camera is support 2.4GHZ wifi, (not support 5G wifi), you can live stream all your videos from your phone or tablet app when you are away from home for remote viewing. Watch your house, office or home 24/7 as a housekeeper
【Application】You can put hidden cameras in your home,office,warehouse, store, garden corners, etc
